name: Do I smell Pizza?
storyline: The pizza arrived but Chubboy DOESN'T SHARE FOOD! The delivery noise wakes your food junky uninvited family and cheese sniffing rats! Throw extremely healthy food to nauseate your family. Spit on the rats do dissolve them. Go fast or get eaten in this FOOD HELL SHOOTER Tower Defense.
summary: The pizza arrived but Chubboy DOESN'T SHARE FOOD! Delivery noise wakes your food junky uninvited family and sniffing rats! Throw extremely healthy food to nauseate them. Go fast or get eaten in this FOOD HELL SHOOTER Tower Defense.
